TopicTitle: Apollo Mission Recreation (And More!) [Requesting Ground Crew Aid!]

Articles.Content:
[quote name='SparkyFox']its only a 6-10 hour trip[/QUOTE]

You do know that this is using Real Solar System, right? More like a few days- at least 7.

[quote name='SparkyFox']DUDE! YOU MUST! like some sort of health bar and oxygen levels and radiation? or able to take your helmet off in space, but you have like 5 seconds to put it on? or make the helmet breakable(I know the helmet I a model though and it doesn't exactly come off)[/QUOTE]
I'm thinking I'm going to have it be just randomly causing illness, but I will add this later.

Hey ZNG, you might want to link to this on the OP:

[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138517-Apollo-Mission-Recreation-%28And-More!%29-Requesting-Ground-Crew-Aid!?p=2305417&viewfull=1#post2305417[/url]

It's the patch list.

I'm really digging the mission patches [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/91405-adsii1970"]adsii1970[/URL][COLOR=#3E3E3E] ;)

Although.. are some misspelled? MTC instead of MCT... or am i wrong?[/COLOR]

[quote name='Dman979']You do know that this is using Real Solar System, right? More like a few days- at least 7.[/QUOTE]

its at least 3 days

[quote name='SparkyFox']its at least 3 days[/QUOTE]

3 days, one way. 6 there and back no including any surface activity.

We should KAS/KIS to the mod list. FASA has surface experiments, and the mirrors, etc to be left on the moon.

[quote name='CliftonM']We should KAS/KIS to the mod list. FASA has surface experiments, and the mirrors, etc to be left on the moon.[/QUOTE]

Possibly, and I am dearly considering it. What's everyone else's thoughts?

It would give more the crew more things to do on the surface of the Moon. Would be a nice thing.

Fine, but PAO has to manage anything carried onboard the rocket.

my great grandad was buzz aldrin so I should know

That's actually the job of the FAO.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[quote name='ZooNamedGames'][COLOR=#333333]Role: Flight Activities Officer (FAO)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#333333]Flight Activites: Manages all crew activities, especially during the lunar operations. He lists the things needed to be done and priorities them based on importance. Works tightly with EECOM and Capcom. As things work, you may or not be needed at times. However during the lunar operations you will be needed.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#333333]Role Requirement: Good Internet speeds..[/COLOR][/QUOTE]
to quote ZNG.

[quote name='MK3424']PAO oversees your actions and schedules ones you have to do.[/QUOTE]

but I get to fly the rocket and land the lander

[quote name='MK3424']I'm really digging the mission patches [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/91405-adsii1970"]adsii1970[/URL][COLOR=#3E3E3E] ;)

Although.. are some misspelled? MTC instead of MCT... or am i wrong?[/COLOR][/QUOTE]

Nope, you're not wrong. They've all been fixed now.

[quote name='SparkyFox']but I get to fly the rocket and land the lander[/QUOTE]
Yes. .

[quote name='CliftonM']Yes. .[/QUOTE]

"therefore"(whatever that means) I GET TO CRA-AAAHHYYEEE MEAN land the lander which puts my in charge of the whole entire mission and I out rank zoo and zoo will kindly admit that(im wrong) Im the big cheese

Translation: that's what I thought

[quote name='SparkyFox']"therefore"(whatever that means) I GET TO CRA-AAAHHYYEEE MEAN land the lander which puts my in charge of the whole entire mission and I out rank zoo and zoo will kindly admit that(im wrong) Im the big cheese[/QUOTE]

No, you will closely follow the schedule that I made for the mission (and that has to be approved by Flight).
Otherwise you won't have anyone to look after you, and the mission will probably end tragically, even if the lander makes it to the Moon. :wink:

[quote name='SparkyFox']but I get to fly the rocket and land the lander[/QUOTE]

Within the limits of the mission, and moreover your still subject to the flight plan written by myself and FAO* (PAO was a typo), as it could affect things with EECOM, booster etc. So your more slave to the flight plan than anything.

[quote name='zoonamedgames']within the limits of the mission, and moreover your still subject to the flight plan written by myself and fao* (pao was a typo), as it could affect things with eecom, booster etc. So your more slave to the flight plan than anything.[/quote]
